original_text: But the land could not support them while they stayed together, for their possessions were so great that they were not able to stay together.
korean_text: 그 땅이 그들이 동거하기에 넉넉하지 못하였으니 이는 그들의 소유가 많아서 동거할 수 없었음이니라

sentences.original_text: But the land could not support them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 땅은 그들을 지탱할 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: for their possessions were so great
that they were not able to stay together
